org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value: echo "Setting executable permissions for manage.py and upgrade.sh..."
terraform init terraform plan -out=tfplan terraform apply -auto-approve tfplan
echo "Saving Terraform state file to Git..."
git config --global user.email "jenkins@example.com" git config --global user.name "Jenkins CI" git add terraform.tfstate git commit -m "Update Terraform state" git push origin main
echo "Building Docker image from the Dockerfile..."
echo "Testing Docker image for basic functionality..."
docker exec test-container /bin/bash -c "echo 'Running health check...'; sleep 2; echo 'Service is up'"
docker stop test-container docker rm test-container

org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.name: Push Docker Image to Docker Hub

org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value: echo "Pushing Docker image to Docker Hub..."
echo "$DOCKER_PASS" | docker login -u "$DOCKER_USER" --password-stdin docker push ${DOCKER_IMAGE_NAME}:latest docker logout
echo "Cleaning up workspace and Docker resources..."
Pipeline failed. Please check the logs.
